mapper.insert: insert into cgorder (cgid, empno, ckflid, coid, sid2, cgdanhao, danjutype, dhtime, shtype, rktype, cgmoney, ydhtime, bz, cgfind) values (#{cgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ckflid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cgdanhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{danjutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dhtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cgmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ydhtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cgfind,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cgorder set empno = #{empno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ckflid = #{ckflid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coid = #{coid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid2 = #{sid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cgdanhao = #{cgdanhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, danjutype = #{danjutype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dhtime = #{dhtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shtype = #{shtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rktype = #{rktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cgmoney = #{cgmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ydhtime = #{ydhtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cgfind = #{cgfind,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cgid = #{cgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cgid, empno, ckflid, coid, sid2, cgdanhao, danjutype, dhtime, shtype, rktype, cgmoney, ydhtime, bz, cgfind from cgorder where cgid = #{cgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
